title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When attempting to create a JAR file, pressing the 'Finish' button results in a failure message: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'5.' The JAR packager is not correctly reporting open files on the system.
OB: The JAR packager reports open files very late.
EB: The JAR packager should accurately report open files when creating a JAR file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the JAR packager.
2. Add some files to the package.
3. Attempt to create the JAR file by pressing the 'Finish' button.
